title: Bastard
description: I’m a f*cking bastard.I f*ck girls to forget about her.She’s the girl I’m not supposed to want … my step-sister.She hates me for what I’ve done.I ruined her life.Now I’m a Motocross racer. A winner. A player. A bastard.But being a bastard comes with bad press.Lucky for me Emily is a PR agent.When she comes to work for me, I’ll make her remember why she once wanted me too.She can’t say no … she needs me to keep her job, and I need her to f*ck me.One way or another, she will be mine again.
author: Coco Cadence
